# ISSUE_TEMPLATE

## Purpose

GitHub issue templates for standardized bug reports and feature requests.

## Key Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `bug_report.md` | Template for reporting bugs with environment details |
| `feature_request.md` | Template for proposing new features |

## For AI Agents

### Working In This Directory

- Templates use GitHub issue template YAML frontmatter
- Keep templates concise but comprehensive
- Include environment information fields for bug reports

## Dependencies

### Internal

- None (standalone templates)
